title: Research Schools
shortDescription: First, Second, and Third Research Schools covering advanced systems science.
longDescription:
Our Research Schools series is a cornerstone of our educational outreach. Spanning from 2023 to 2025, these schools bring together experts, students, and practitioners to delve into advanced topics in systems science.

Key topics include:

  • Quantum Computing and Systems
  • Sustainable Agricultural Practices
  • Cognitive Science & Consciousness

Participants will engage in hands-on workshops, seminars, and collaborative projects designed to foster innovation and practical problem-solving skills.

title: AI for Social Good
shortDescription: Transforming Challenges into Opportunities with Artificial Intelligence.
longDescription:
We are launching a new initiative effectively utilizing Artificial Intelligence to solve social challenges. From healthcare accessibility to educational equity, our teams are working on algorithms that care.

Join our webinar to learn more about how you can contribute to this open-source movement.

title: Dynamic Sustainable Solutions Conference
shortDescription: An international gathering of minds to discuss sustainable solutions for the future.
longDescription: The Dynamic Sustainable Solutions Conference will be held in Waterloo this year. More information will be available soon.
